sections.subtitle: When CZ tweets, CZILLA roars. Burns, airdrops, and chaos unleashed on-chain.
sections.text: Experience the power of CZILLA as it transforms the crypto space with every tweet. Join the revolution where chaos meets opportunity.

items.title: 1Ô∏è‚É£ CZ Tweets ‚Üí The Trigger
items.subtitle: Every CZ post ignites the system
items.text: Every time CZ posts on X, CZILLA wakes. The system assigns 1x points per tweet and 0.5x per reply ‚Äî each word counts toward the Daily Roar Score.

items.title: 2Ô∏è‚É£ Roar Points ‚Üí The Energy
items.subtitle: Community interaction fuels the core
items.text: Roar points are the heartbeat of the ecosystem. The more the community interacts and CZ speaks, the more energy builds up inside The Reactor Core ‚Äî our Treasury.

items.title: 3Ô∏è‚É£ Chaos Wheel ‚Üí The Outcome
items.subtitle: Pure decentralized unpredictability
items.text: Every 24 hours, the accumulated Roar energy activates the Chaos Wheel, deciding between Airdrops or Buyback & Burn events. No one controls the outcome ‚Äî it's pure decentralized chaos.

sections.text:
CZILLA was born from the collective power of a community tired of empty meme coins. Here, chaos has structure, and memes fuel real mechanisms ‚Äî taxes that sustain liquidity, buybacks that stabilize value, and a Treasury that rewards holders.

Our goal? To merge entertainment and tokenomics into a self-sustaining ecosystem where every roar matters. CZILLA is not a project ‚Äî it's an evolution of the meme economy.

items.title: ü¶æ Dynamic tokenomics with measurable impact
items.text: Real-time mechanisms that respond to market conditions and community activity, creating tangible value through transparent operations.

items.title: üé° Real-time link to CZ's Twitter activity
items.text: Every tweet and reply from CZ directly influences the ecosystem, creating immediate and transparent reactions that fuel the CZILLA engine.

items.title: üí• Community-driven energy accumulation
items.text: The more the community engages and CZ tweets, the more energy builds up in our ecosystem, powering rewards and creating sustainable growth.

items.title: üî• Transparent Treasury ‚Äî the Reactor Core
items.text: Our Treasury operates with full transparency, serving as the heart of CZILLA where all energy accumulates and distributions are decided by pure decentralized chaos.
